name: Tanker_Melee.Claws
display_help: Claws are bones or blades that extend from your hands and cause Lethal damage. The lightweight, natural feel of claws gives this power set a reduced Endurance cost and faster attack rate than other Brute melee sets.

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Swipe
powers.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Strike
powers.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your claws. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Slash
powers.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your claws, dealing a good amount of lethal damage, but with a longer recharge rate than Swipe or Strike . This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 39.09 lethal damage on target after 0.5s delay
44.76 lethal damage on target after 0.5s delay
-7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
17.59 fire damage on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To-Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -100.00% strength to range for 20s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Spin
powers.display_help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a Strike attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Follow_Up
powers.display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals moderate damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus Damage and chance to hit for a brief time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 10.00% to hit for 10s on self after 0.2s delay
30.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self after 0.2s delay

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Focus
powers.display_help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focus deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Eviscerate
powers.display_help: You spin and slash violently, Eviscerating all foes in a wide arc in front of you. Note that Eviscerate is unaffected by Arc changes. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 90° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: -7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Claws.Shockwave
powers.display_help: Projects a Shockwave of focused power that can travel a short distance. Shockwave travels in a wide arc in front of you dealing moderate damage and, possibly knocking back foes. Note that Shockwave is unaffected by Arc changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 30 ft. radius 90° arc (10 targets max)
